content: कणिकः {@--1@} A grain. {@--2@} A small particle. {@--3@} An ear of corn. {@--4@} A meal of parched wheat. {@--5@} An enemy. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a purificatory ceremony, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} waving round lamps at sacrificial rites. --का {@--1@} An atom, a small or minute particle. {@--2@} A drop (of water); <ls>Me. 98.</ls> {@--3@} A kind of corn or rice. {@--4@} Cumin seed. {@--5@} The अग्निमंथ tree.
